```{r}
Sleep = read.csv("sleepdata.csv", sep = ";")

  "Start_Time",
  "Wake_Up_Time",
  "Sleep_Quality",
  "Time_In_Bed",
  "Wake_Up_Mood",
  "Sleep_Notes",
  "Heart_Rate",
  "Steps_Taken"
```
